metadata.title: Kingsize Men's Big & Tall Expandable Waist Relaxed Fit Jeans
features: BIG AND TALL SIZING: You should order Tall if you are 6'2" or taller. You should order Big if you are 6'1" or shorter
Our Expandable Waist Relaxed Fit Jeans have got your fit issues covered. Side-elastic insets at the waist expands the waist up to 4" for a personalized fit.
Fly front with zip and button closure. Waistband expands up to 4". 10 oz. denim in classic cotton. Machine wash; imported

ABOUT THE BRAND: KingSize has been dedicated to the style and comfort of the big & tall man since 1920. We design our clothes and accessories from the ground-up, to meet the daily demands of our customer; putting his needs, concerns, and ease of use above all else. We are proud to call ourselves the one and only Big & Tall Experts.
description: Our Expandable Waist Relaxed Fit Jeans have got your fit issues covered. Side-elastic insets at the waist expands the waist up to 4" for a personalized fit.  Relaxed fit5 PocketsFly front with zip and button closureWaistband expands up to 4"10 oz. denim in classic cottonMachine wash; imported Big inseam 38"  Tall inseam 40"  Select "Hem Pants Length" above for a finished inseam. Add 7.49 per pair. (Sorry, we cannot reimburse alteration charges if finished pants are returned.)
